MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 7pm to repair an underground cable fault and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.30pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.36pm on Saturday 21st November 2020.
